SEARCH
Package com.petfoster.controllers

Class AdoptionHistoryController

java.lang.Object
com.petfoster.controllers.AdoptionHistoryController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") @RequestMapping("/adoption-history") public class AdoptionHistoryController extends Object
Controller class for managing adoption History. Handles reqeusts related to adoption Historu and communicates with the service layer.
